channel.title: Understanding AI

item.title:
Neural Networks - Part 1:
Single-layer Perceptron
item.dc:creator: {"name"=>"Jelmer van Nuss", "email"=>"jelmervannuss@gmail.com", "info"=>nil}
item.description: Neural networks are classifiers, meaning that they can be used to determine which class an object belongs to. There are several types of neural networks, such as the multilayer perceptron, which will be discussed in subsequent posts. Here, I will explain a simple kind of neural network, the single-layer perceptron.
